channel.title: Configs on WebLogic Deploy Tooling
channel.description: Recent content in Configs on WebLogic Deploy Tooling

item.description: Target Environments The Discover Domain and Prepare Model Tools allow you to customize the model and other files produced to be compatible with a specific target environment. Options for a target environment may include: Using model tokens for some attributes in the model (see Model Tokens) Using Kubernetes secrets for credentials in the model Applying filters to the model (see Model Filters) Creating additional configuration files for the target system Specifying a Target Environment Each tool specifies a target environment using the command-line argument -target <target-name>, where <target-name> refers to a pre-configured target environment, or a user-defined environment.
